data.content: Implementation verified: per-repo async write queue in src/lib/knots.ts (commit 1feef77). Six write ops (newKnot, claimKnot, pollKnot, updateKnot, addEdge, removeEdge) route through execWriteâ†’withWriteSerialization. Five read ops remain concurrent. Five tests in knots-write-serialization.test.ts. All quality gates pass (lint, tsc, 970 tests).
